document_data.name: Salid Dhuzma
document_data.mainbody: '''Salid Dhuzma''', or the '''Grand Verser of the South''', was a famous [[bard]] who lived in [[Khalab]] during the mid 14h century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Students from all over [[East Faerûn]] and the [[Hordelands]] would travel to the small fishing village of Khalab with the hopes of becoming Salid's next pupil. Sadly for these prospective students, Salid would only take one pupil each year.

Salid lived within [[Baelzur's Tower]]. He preferred the comfort of living in a small village to the riches he could have had while living in one of the larger cities located on [[Brightstar Lake|Gbor Nor]].
document_data.Relationships: Salim was once the apprentice of [[Tilmar Wanderfoot.]]
